hero.title: Volunteers
hero.subtitle: More Flexibility. More Gains. More Impact.
hero.subSubtitle:
Connect to impactful projects changing the world in a myriad of ways.
Use your technical experience and develop new technical and leadership skills while significantly helping social impact projects achieve their goals.

block1intro.title: Our software allows you to focus on what's most important: doing good.

items.title: Ease-of-Use
items.paragraph:
We have designed a seamless experience to make researching and starting projects a straightforward and rewarding experience.
As a volunteer, you’re able to give your time and skills on your own schedule.

items.title: Centralization
items.paragraph:
We care about quality over quantity, ensuring you are perfectly matched to projects and social organizations that fit not only your skills but your interests.
Consider Ovio as a shop for skill-based volunteering from a 10-minutes code review to long-term involvement.

items.title: Personalization
items.paragraph:
Over time, our software gets to know your interests, passions and skills, it will continuously improve finding the best match for you.
You’ll be able to volunteer alongside other talented developers from around the world.

block3howto.title: How to sign up?
block3howto.subtitle: Sounds like Ovio is a place for you to volunteer your skills?

processItems.title: 1. Visit
processItems.text: Visit <ExternalLink href='https://explore.ovio.org'>Explore</ExternalLink> now and discover 200+ open-source projects

processItems.title: 2. Log in
processItems.text: Log in to personalize your experience

processItems.title: 3. Add details
processItems.text: Fill out your profile to get matched to more project opportunities such as <Tag>mentoring</Tag> <Tag>project-based</Tag> <Tag>task-based</Tag> <Tag>...</Tag>

processItems.title: 4. Spread the word
processItems.text: Share your experience with your community and beyond. Post details of your experience on social medias, talk with your friends, or ask your employer to sponsor your engagement.

hero.title: Social Impact Organizations
hero.subtitle: Better Help. Better Cooperation. Bigger Scale.
hero.subSubtitle: Are you a nonprofit, B-corp or other form of social good organization looking to maximize your impact in the world? Do you need access to a pool of talented, technically skilled volunteers to develop technology?

items.title: Leverage open-source technology
items.paragraph: Create maintainable code and lower development cost with Ovio. Working with multiple organizations, we have developed a strong expertise in open-source and how to leverage it in the social impact sector.

items.title: Showcase your impactful project
items.paragraph: Let's others know about your great work and showcase your mission to a world-wide community of do-gooders.

items.title: Attract volunteers
items.paragraph:
Access a pool of talented volunteers and engage them on your project.
All volunteers are vetted to match your projects and issue areas with their skills and interests.

items.title: Maintain Sustainable Solutions
items.paragraph: By focusing on open-source, we can transform micro-volunteering into long-term impact. We know it's a challenge to ensure a continuous and sustainable volunteering effort within your organization. Access a large pool of talents that will keep your project up to date one task at the time.

processItems.title: Submit
processItems.text: Submit your project and get access to a pool of committed volunteers. We match your needs with volunteers’ talents and interests to ensure your project’s viability.

processItems.title: Request
processItems.text: Create more maintainable code and foster collaboration around your project while lowering development costs. Done right, open-source brings visibility, transparency and scalability to your project. Transform your solution into an actively collaborative and sustainable solution.

hero.title: Students & Universities
hero.subtitle: Develop your technical skills and do good at the same time!
hero.subSubtitle: Ovio connects students and faculties to amazing opportunities to give back, in local communities and internationally.

block1intro.title: We help student groups, CS classes, teachers and faculties accelerate tech for good on campus!

items.title: Find the right project
items.paragraph: Ovio accumulates a large portfolio of software development projects (250+) to include every type of engineering skills and interest in the social impact sector. We help you find local and international opportunities.

items.title: Develop your skills
items.paragraph: Volunteer alongside other talented developers from around the world. Develop new skills or improve existing ones while collaborating on an impactful project.

items.title: Showcase your work
items.paragraph: Expose your code and showcase your work to a worldwide community of tech employers. Better your Github profile.

processItems.text: Partner with us to find the right project for your class/group
